function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding regarding the impact of weather conditions on transmission rates","Impact":"Failure to accurately assess the association of weather conditions with transmission rates","Mitigation":"Conducting more detailed and specific studies on the impact of temperature, absolute humidity, and relative humidity on transmission rates","Technologies":"Advanced weather monitoring technology","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Confusion bias between weather conditions and Variant of Concern (VoC)","Impact":"Misinterpretation of transmission rates and factors contributing to increased transmissibility","Mitigation":"Conducting separate analyses on the impact of weather conditions and VoC on transmission rates","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing technology, weather data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential overfitting of complex models","Impact":"Loss of accuracy and reliability in assessing transmission rates and associated factors","Mitigation":"Using simpler models with clear and interpretable results, avoiding unnecessary complexity","Technologies":"Modeling and statistical analysis software","People":"Statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
